Text:
Pre-emptive dumbass avoidance:

7z is an archive format, use http://www.7-zip.org to work with them. Basically it's a zip file, only not retarded.

To clarify: This is a mod for Firefly Studio's Stronghold (NOT Crusader)

It adds all sorts of LOTR stuff. See here: http://stronghold.heavengames.com/coer/lotrpack

We are putting up this torrent as the mirrors they chose to use are slow as ass.


I recommend backing up your Stronghold directory before installing.
